title: Asking about pet adoption
context: Ask an animal shelter worker how the rescue process works.

patterns.meaning: Asking about the process or system

dialogs.description: Asking about pet adoption at a shelter

lines.speaker: Visitor
lines.text: Hi, I'm interested in adopting a pet. How does the rescue process work here?

lines.speaker: Shelter Worker
lines.text: Well, first you need to fill out an application, then we'll discuss what kind of pet is best for you.

lines.speaker: Potential Adopter
lines.text: Could you please explain the adoption procedure?

lines.speaker: Shelter Staff
lines.text: Of course, we start with an application, followed by a meet and greet with the pet, and then finalize the adoption.
